H.R. 3809 (106th): To amend chapter 4 of title 39, United States Code, to allow postal patrons to contribute to funding for organ and tissue donation awareness through the voluntary purchase of certain specially issued United States postage stamps.
H.R. 4467 (106th): Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation Adjustment Act
H.R. 1146 (106th): American Sovereignty Restoration Act of 1999
H.Con.Res. 442 (106th): Providing for a conditional adjournment of the House of Representatives and a conditional recess or adjournment of the Senate.
S. 1592 (106th): Central American and Haitian Parity Act of 1999
H.Res. 645 (106th): Returning to the Senate the bill S. 1109.
S. 1331 (106th): Lincoln County Land Act of 2000
H.R. 2066 (106th): To amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to authorize the annual enrollment of land in the wetlands reserve program, to extend the program through 2005, and for other purposes.
H.R. 3377 (106th): Genetically Engineered Food Right to Know Act
H.R. 5066 (106th): National Missile Defense Deployment Criteria Act of 2000
H.R. 1651 (106th): Fishermen’s Protective Act Amendments of 2000
H.J.Res. 59 (106th): Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States prohibiting courts from levying or increasing taxes.
H.R. 1342 (106th): Children’s Gun Violence Prevention Act of 1999
H.R. 1600 (106th): American Profit Sharing Act
H.R. 1333 (106th): First-time Homebuyer Affordability Act of 1999
H.R. 925 (106th): Osteoporosis Early Detection and Prevention Act of 1999
H.R. 1564 (106th): To require the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study regarding Fort King, Florida.
H.R. 1679 (106th): Airfare Relief Act of 1999
S. 1166 (106th): A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify that natural gas gathering lines are 7-year property for purposes of depreciation.
H.R. 2425 (106th): Oceans Act of 1999
S. 2208 (106th): To suspend temporarily the duty on Neo Heliopan MA (Menthyl Anthranilate).
S. 150 (106th): A bill for the relief of Marina Khalina and her son, Albert Mifakhov.
H.R. 2827 (106th): National Sustainable Fuels and Chemicals Act of 1999
H.R. 3643 (106th): American Telecommuter Protection Act
H.Res. 176 (106th): Recognizing the historical significance of the Supreme Court’s unanimous decision in Brown v. Board of Education, repudiating segregation, and reaffirming the fundamental belief that we are all “one Nation under God, indivisible”.
H.R. 3411 (106th): Northwest Territory of the Great Lakes National Heritage Area Act of 1999
H.J.Res. 107 (106th): Expressing the sense of Congress regarding the need for a White House Conference to discuss and develop national recommendations concerning quality of care in assisted living facilities in the United States.

S. 1111 (106th): National Conference on Small Business Act
H.R. 3446 (106th): Surface Transportation Board Reform Act of 1999
H.R. 458 (106th): Children’s Health Equity Act of 1999
S.Res. 205 (106th): A resolution designating the week of each November in which the holiday of Thanksgiving is observed as “National Family Week”.
S. 1894 (106th): A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain land to Park County, Wyoming.
S. 806 (106th): Taxpayer Freedom and Fairness Act
H.R. 469 (106th): Jeremy and Julia’s Law
S. 2891 (106th): Air Travelers Fair Treatment Act of 2000
S. 1716 (106th): School Environment Protection Act of 1999
H.R. 2157 (106th): To commission a study by the Federal Trade Commission of the marketing practices of the motion picture, recording, and video/personal computer game industries.
H.R. 2835 (106th): To require an assessment of research on effects of radio frequency emissions on human health.
